QuestData.Title: Kindling the Fire
QuestData.Description: Now that that's done with, let's get to it then!$B$BHuo, the spirit of fire, hungers for dry dogwood root kindling. It grows among the trees south of the village. It should be easy enough for you to gather some.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you're not shy about getting your hands dirty.
QuestData.RewardText: $n! You've returned, roots in hand! You're a down-to-business kind of $G guy:gal;, aren't you? I like that!
